title:
Instructions Cook pasta according to package and rinse with cold water when done. Drain & set aside.
In a large bowl, add cold pasta, chopped eggs, celery, bell pepper, and onion mixture.
Toss to combine.
Add in dill relish, sweet relish and tuna.
Stir to combine.
Stir in mayonnaise.
Season to taste with black pepper, Old Bay and seasoning salt (if needed)
Spread into a casserole dish.
Garnish with paprika and parsley flakes.
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
directions: Cook pasta according to package and rinse with cold water when done. Drain & set aside.
In a large bowl, add cold pasta, chopped eggs, celery, bell pepper, and onion mixture.
Add in dill relish, sweet relish and tuna.
Season to taste with black pepper, Old Bay and seasoning salt (if needed)
Garnish with paprika and parsley flakes.
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
ingredients: ⅓ cup finely diced mixture of celery, green bell pepper, and onion (see note)
black pepper, Old Bay, seasoning salt to taste
